## Excerpt from README
N/A. The author just showcases the theme's features.

## Features
- Custom colour schemes
- Custom workspace background
- Alternate (cards) layout
- Colourful frame
- Callouts
- Rainbow folder
- and many more...

| Criteria | Status |
